ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hell 3?  What Hell 3?
ygData.msgSnippet: SHOOSH. I ve camped the Cyc on several occaisions, even being so luck as to kill him once. Naturally I used the ring to help my warrior buddy get his J boots,
ygData.messageBody:
SHOOSH.

I've camped the Cyc on several occaisions, even being so luck as to kill him
once. Naturally I used the ring to help my warrior buddy get his J boots,
but there are PLENTY of times I would use them if I had them. One day I'll
go back and camp that AC for myself.

Drae

-----Original Message-----
From: Blitz Krieg [mailto:blitz_krieg@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2000 4:03 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hell 3? What Hell 3?


> p.s. how many sow potions can you buy for 3250gp?

this.... heh

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
